text:
@RawStory “Among participants in Drollinger’s bible studies are Mike Pompeo, HUD Sec Ben Carson, Ed Sec Betsy DeVos & Health Sec Alex Azar (who along w/Carson are members of coronavirus task force). Other participants inc 52 GOP lawmakers.”
Why are science deniers allowed an opinion⁉️⁉️
